lang.label: Start with selecting type and shape

If you require a Headstone and Base, use the Tools to switch to Headstone and Base.

Select your preferred shape from the available shapes on the right. Once you have decided upon a shape, click on it. Once complete then please CLICK NEXT

Click on any part of a
Headstone and then select granite color from the available colors on the right side of screen.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Click on any part of a
Headstone and then select sizes using the + and - buttons on the right side of screen.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Type your inscription on the right side of screen, one line at a time.

When a line is complete, click "Add New Line".

A line of text on the design can be selected by clicking on it. Only selected text can be manipulated in the design.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Select your photo type by clicking on an image on the right side of screen.

Once you have decided upon a Photo type, click on it. Then Crop Screen will appear with additional instructions for uploading Image from your computer.

If you do not require a photo then please CLICK NEXT

Select your motif type by clicking on an image on the right side of screen.

Once you have decided upon a Motif type, click on it. Then Motif Library will appear with categories to choose from.

If you do not require a motif then please CLICK NEXT

In order to SAVE YOUR DESIGN, you have to Create an Account.

Please click on MY ACCOUNT in the top left hand of the screen.

Once you will create ACCOUNT, you will be able to Save the Design, Edit it and Order the Design.

Once you have read then please CLICK NEXT

Check Price is a tool that allow you to check and compare the prices of each element of the design.

You can also download a PDF with the design and the quote and to your friends and family an e-mail to the family.

Once you've checked the price,
please CLICK NEXT

Congratulations! You have completed a design!

If you wish to save this design, then please login or register. Once saved, you can: edit it at any time and then order the design.]>

Congratulations! You have ordered a design!

We will contact you within
1-3 business days to confirm the shipping address and ask if you have any special requests.
Start with selecting type and shape

If you require a Headstone and Base, use the Tools to switch to Headstone and Base.

Select your preferred shape from the available shapes on the right. Once you have decided upon a shape, click on it. Once complete then please CLICK NEXT

Click on any part of a
Headstone and then select sizes using the + and - buttons on the right side of screen.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Type your inscription on the right side of screen, one line at a time.

When a line is complete, click "Add New Line".

A line of text on the design can be selected by clicking on it. Only selected text can be manipulated in the design.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Select your photo type by clicking on an image on the right side of screen.

Once you have decided upon a Photo type, click on it. Then Crop Screen will appear with additional instructions for uploading Image from your computer.

If you do not require a photo then please CLICK NEXT

Select your motif type by clicking on an image on the right side of screen.

Once you have decided upon a Motif type, click on it. Then Motif Library will appear with categories to choose from.

If you do not require a motif then please CLICK NEXT

In order to SAVE YOUR DESIGN, you have to Create an Account.

Please click on MY ACCOUNT in the top left hand of the screen.

Once you will create ACCOUNT, you will be able to Save the Design, Edit it and Order the Design.

Once you have read then please CLICK NEXT

Check Price is a tool that allow you to check and compare the prices of each element of the design.

You can also download a PDF with the design and the quote and to your friends and family an e-mail to the family.

Once you've checked the price,
please CLICK NEXT

Congratulations! You have completed a design!

If you wish to save this design, then please login or register. Once saved, you can: edit it at any time and then order the design.]>

Congratulations! You have ordered a design!

We will contact you within
1-3 business days to confirm the shipping address and ask if you have any special requests.
Start with selecting type and shape
Select your preferred shape from the available shapes on the right. Once you have decided upon a shape, click on it. Once complete then please CLICK NEXT

Select bronze color from the available colors on the right side of screen.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Click on Plaque and then select sizes using the + and - buttons on the right side of screen.

You can also add a Border.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Type your inscription on the right side of screen, one line at a time.

When a line is complete, click "Add New Line".

A line of text on the design can be selected by clicking on it. Only selected text can be manipulated in the design.

Once complete then
please CLICK NEXT

Select your photo type by clicking on an image on the right side of screen.

Once you have decided upon a Photo type, click on it. Then Crop Screen will appear with additional instructions for uploading Image from your computer.

If you do not require a photo then please CLICK NEXT

Select your motif type by clicking on an image on the right side of screen.

Once you have decided upon a Motif type, click on it. Then Motif Library will appear with categories to choose from.

If you do not require a motif then please CLICK NEXT

In order to SAVE YOUR DESIGN, you have to Create an Account.

Please click on MY ACCOUNT in the top left hand of the screen.

Once you will create ACCOUNT, you will be able to Save the Design, Edit it and Order the Design.

Once you have read then please CLICK NEXT

Check Price is a tool that allow you to check and compare the prices of each element of the design.

You can also download a PDF with the design and the quote and to your friends and family an e-mail to the family.

Once you've checked the price,
please CLICK NEXT

Congratulations! You have completed a design!

If you wish to save this design, then please login or register. Once saved, you can: edit it at any time and then order the design.]>

Congratulations! You have ordered a design!

We will contact you within
1-3 business days to confirm the shipping address and ask if you have any special requests.

If you require a Headstone and Base, use the Tools to switch to Headstone and Base.

Once you will create ACCOUNT, you will be able to Save the Design, Edit it and Order the Design.

Once you have read then please CLICK NEXT

Check Price is a tool that allow you to check and compare the prices of each element of the design.

You can also download a PDF with the design and the quote and to your friends and family an e-mail to the family.

Once you've checked the price,
please CLICK NEXT

Congratulations! You have completed a design!

If you wish to save this design, then please login or register. Once saved, you can: edit it at any time and then order the design.]>
